thread.section_title: Reservation Counter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reservation Counter | reservationcounter.com | 3 of 1174
thread.title: cliff mackay
thread.title_full: Reservation Counter reviewed by cliff mackay

author: cliff mackay
title: cliff mackay
text: DO NOT use Reservation Counter to book ANYTHING. I was told I could book adjoining rooms, and when I arrived I was told I could not. I was visiting DC to celebrate my best friends promotion in the military so we wanted adjoining rooms and we were going to call a few places but basically were lied to so that we would book. Very bad customer service.
